advancedAgentNames.warning: Only change these if you know what you're doing. These settings are for users with custom OpenCode agents (e.g., oh-my-opencode plugin with Sisyphus/Planner-Sisyphus agents).

opencodeDefaultAgent.label: Default Mode
opencodeDefaultAgent.description: Agent name for full-permission mode. Use 'Sisyphus' for oh-my-opencode, or 'build' for vanilla OpenCode.

opencodePlanAgent.label: Plan Mode
opencodePlanAgent.description: Agent name for restricted/planning mode. Use 'Planner-Sisyphus' for oh-my-opencode, or 'plan' for vanilla OpenCode. Note: Planner-Sisyphus inherits its model from OpenCode's plan agent config, so the model override above may not apply. Configure the model in ~/.config/opencode/oh-my-opencode.json instead.
